extendedInfo.description: Welcome to Chor Police !!Chor Police provides services like online food ordering, online corporate tiffin service, food catering, event catering, Tiffin, canteen contract, food export - import, packaged foods, namkeen, snacks, farsan. We are bringing online services for the first time to cater today's generation and make it easy to order and setup parties. It's easy to order online and we have also kept cash on delivery option for reliable transaction.  Chor Police provides corporate tiffin services to many companies in Ahmedabad. We serve different packages of tiffins for lunch. We cover entire Ahmedabad region and provide pick up and drop service for tiffin.      Apart from tiffin, we even serve snacks at corporate parties - weekly/monthly. Online ordering can also be done through our website for snacks. We are dedicated to serve you quanlity and timely service.Catering, snacks, namkeens are other services provided by Chor Police.   Contact Us : info@chorpolice.in   For app performance or technical errors or any suggestion send email to manit@mobileapplicationtesters.com
